snippet.title: Gun Gun Pixies - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
PQube and developer Compile Heart are excited to share a new trailer for Gun Gun Pixies today! It showcases gameplay of the crazy Japanese third-person-shooter, landing in Europe physically and digitally for Nintendo Switch on September 6th! The game is out digitally in North America on September 10th and physically on November 1st. The PC/Steam version of Gun Gun Pixies will also be available on November 1st!

The crazy Japanese third-person shooter and 3D platformer-in-one sends two tiny girls from outer space to earth, so that they can infiltrate a women's college dormitory. Once arrived, the Pixies stealthily bustle about the regular sized girls' towering legs and rooms to fulfill their mission: study human behaviour in order to help overcome the social issues of their beloved home planet!

More information: http://pqube.co.uk/gun-gun-pixies

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! 
https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU

#GunGunPixies
